hero.title: Fast and reliable cargo delivery
hero.subtitle: Track packages, manage addresses, and get notifications.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Follow four simple steps to receive your purchase from China

steps.title: 1. Register
steps.description: Register on the website to get your personal address in China. It takes 1 minute.

steps.title: 2. Shop online
steps.description: Order products from Chinese online stores and use the provided address.

steps.title: 3. Register your purchase
steps.description: Register your purchase in your account and pay for delivery online.

steps.title: 4. Receive
steps.description: Delivery takes about 7 days after shipping. Track your parcel status.
